text: Louis Alphonse van Gasteren (20 November 1922 - 10 May 2016) was a Dutch movie director, movie producer, and artist. He was born in Amsterdam. He was known for his movies Hans: Het Leven Voor De Dood (1983) and De prijs van overleven (2003). He won two Golden Calf Awards. His career began in the 1950s. At the time of his death, he was the oldest active filmmaker in the Netherlands. Van Gasteren died in Amsterdam on 10 May 2016, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Artists from Amsterdam Category:Dutch movie directors Category:Dutch movie producers
title: Louis van Gasteren
